entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 6:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Showers beginning in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 in the morning except 60 over exposed coastal sections late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the evening then cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 6:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
